short_summary: Exterior renovations to two Government of Canada Recognized Heritage Buildings located in Waterton, Alberta
description: Exterior renovations to two Government of Canada Recognized Heritage Buildings located in Waterton, Alberta, including removal of existing damaged stucco finish and replacement with new stucco finish, removal of existing damaged wooden trim & window sills and replacement with new wooden trim & window sills in a style and finish to match the existing facade, repair and repointing of heritage stone fencing and front steps, and other work required to restore the exterior finishes of the buildings.
full_summary:
# Exterior Renovation Project – Waterton, Alberta

**Solicitation Number**: M5000-22-5249/A

**Publication Date**: October 3, 2023

**Tender Closing Date**: October 18, 2023, 16:00:00

The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) invites qualified contractors to submit bids for the Exterior Renovation Project at the Waterton, Alberta location.

**Project Overview**

The project involves renovating two Government of Canada Recognized Heritage Buildings, including:

* Removing and replacing damaged stucco finish and wooden trim & window sills
* Repairing and repointing heritage stone fencing and front steps
* Performing other necessary work to restore the exterior finishes of the buildings

**Project Scope**

The scope of work includes the removal and reinstatement of an exterior set of stairs for one building and ensuring safe access to the second floor during the renovation project. The project timeline is expected to be completed by June 1, 2024.

This is a first phase of a two-phase competition. Phase one will evaluate bidder qualifications based on mandatory requirements. Phase two will invite qualified bidders to submit a financial bid on the project based on the specifications and drawings.

**Notice of Proposed Procurement**

Canada retains the right to negotiate with any supplier on any procurement. Bid documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

**Security Requirement**

The tender includes a security requirement. Interested contractors are referred to the attached Request for Qualifications for further information.

**Trade Agreements**

The tender is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and the Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Businesses.

**Contact Information**

For further information, please contact:
Sandra Robinson
(rcmp-grc.gc.ca)
(780) 670-8626

**Attachments**

The following documents are available for download:

* Request for Qualifications
* Specifications and Drawings
* Sample Insurance Policy

Please visit [http://www.buyandsell.gc.ca/tenders](http://www.buyandsell.gc.ca/tenders) for more information.
